attributes.action: Include care home deaths in uk covid numbers.
attributes.background:
For more information, please re read the "what do you want us to do" box.
It is very clear and the message and logic based on science, should be understood by any Oxford or Cambridge alumni.

rejection.details: Since this petition was started, the tragic deaths in care homes have been added to the overall UK numbers. You can find out more here: https://www.ons.gov.uk/peoplepopulationandcommunity/birthsdeathsandmarriages/deaths/articles/wheretofindstatisticsonukdeathsinvolvingthecoronaviruscovid19andinfectionratesbycountry/2020-05-19
